sourcesContent:
import './style.css' import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Login(){ const [correo, setCorreo] = useState(''); const [contrasena, setContrasena] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const ingresar = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() try { const response = await fetch('/validation/signin', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ correo: correo, contrasena: contrasena, }), }); if (!response){ console.log('La response fallo1' + error) } const data = await response.json(); console.log(data) if (response.ok) { localStorage.setItem('x-access-token', data.token); navigate('/perfil'); } else { console.log('Esto es un error2') error(data.message || 'Error en la autenticación'); } } catch (error) { setError('Hubo un problema con la solicitud.'); console.error('Esto es un error 3' + error); navigate(data.redirect) } } return(

) } export default Login;
